description:
Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref PP/2014/2704 dated 29/04/2014 for 'Erection of two single storey extensions to west side to enlarge the dining room and Sixth Form accommodation and an adjacent replacement detached bin store with additional pedestrian access off Villiers Road (Deemed Consent)'. The Non-Material Amendments include 1. Omission of 2 no. access ramps and associated railings from west/front elevation
 2. Alteration to side elevation to include addition of a rain water pipe and replacement of glazing with brickwork to match existing 3. Omission of 2 no. projecting shelves from west/front elevation 4. Omission of approved double door and adjoining glazing from west/front elevation for elevation to remain as existing with window and black privacy panels
 5. Replacement of window with double glazed door to west/front elevation 6. Alteration of doorway and glazing arrangement to side elevation 7. Alteration to west/front elevation of approved 6th Form CafT to remain as existing
 8. Alteration to approved windows on the front/west elevation to decreasing in height (subsequently the plaster work above the windows are proposed to increase)
